name: The Last Show (BinaryPrinciple)
description:
Story

You and your band were kidnapped by the hotel where you played your last gig. 

Now you have until midnight to escape with your bandmates and play one Last Show, sound easy,... but the hotel manager knows that is haunted and setup special robots to capture ghost. 

Evade the robots, or sometimes haunt them to reach secret areas, get the keys to open the rooms and play your bandmates songs to set them free.

Escape by getting all the keys and bandmates; and finally taking your place with them.

Controls

Keyboard

  • Move: WASD / Arrows
  • Bring out the Sax / Haunt Robots: SPACE
  • Play the Sax Notes: WASD / Arrows

Gamepad

  • Move: Rigt
  • Bring out the Sax / Haunt Robots: Bumpers or Triggers (RT, LT, LB, RB)
  • Play the Sax:  Face buttons (A,B,X,Y  |  X,O,SQUARE,TRIANGLE)

Win / Loose Conditions

Win

  • Get all the Note Keys
  • Rescue all the Band mates
  • Walk through the open hall and place yourself on the marked spot.

Loose

  • When the timer runs out and you don't have all the keys, bandmates or reach the final hall.
